items.title: Trump refuses to rule out 3rd term, says he got 'perfect' MRI at Walter Reed
items.description: Speaking with reporters on board Air Force One on Monday, President Donald Trump again refused to rule out a bid for a third presidential term.

items.title: Hurricane Melissa live updates: Storm upgraded to Category 5 on approach to Jamaica
items.description: Hurricane Melissa strengthened into a Category 5 storm as it churned northwest through the Caribbean Sea toward Jamaica.

items.title: Flights to LAX halted due to air traffic controller shortage
items.description: Flights departing for Los Angeles are being held due to a staffing shortage.

items.title: WATCH:  Man struggles to walk as powerful winds hit France
items.description: Strong winds in central France made it difficult for the man seen in this video to stay upright, much less make any forward progress.

items.title: WATCH:  Snow leopard cub treated to first pumpkin at Michigan zoo
items.description: A snow leopard cub named Juniper was treated to her first pumpkin during Halloween-themed enrichment at the John Ball Zoo in Michigan.
